messages.content: Process the pending orders for customer ID 33445. Check their account status, verify inventory for all items, apply any applicable discounts, and create invoices.

content.text: I will start by checking account status and retrieving pending orders for customer 33445.

messages.content:
No pending orders were found for this customer, so there is nothing to invoice right now.
Next steps:
1) If you expected orders, confirm the date range and order status filters used by the source system.
2) Provide an order ID and I can check its current status and eligibility for invoicing.
3) If orders are being created upstream, confirm they are reaching the pending state required for invoicing.
